headline: Energy sector: Does US–Venezuela uncertainty make it too risky?
summary: MJP Wealth Advisors chief investment officer Brian Vendig and Yahoo Finance Markets and Data Editor Jared Blikre sit down with Morning Brief host Julie Hyman to discuss the energy sector (XLE), especially in the context of growing uncertainty stemming from tensions between the US and Venezuela. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief.

content.title: Energy sector: Does US–Venezuela uncertainty make it too risky?
content.description:
MJP Wealth Advisors chief investment officer Brian Vendig and Yahoo Finance Markets and Data Editor Jared Blikre sit down with Morning Brief host Julie Hyman to discuss the energy sector (XLE), especially in the context of growing uncertainty stemming from tensions between the US and Venezuela.

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief.
